item.title: Okta pops more than 20% on strong earnings and guidance beat
item.description: Okta shares soared on Tuesday after the identity and access management company delivered strong fourth-quarter earnings and beat on guidance.

item.title: Best Buy shares plunge as CEO warns price increases are 'highly likely' due to Trump tariffs
item.description: Best Buy beat Wall Street's fourth-quarter earnings and revenue estimates as the company's computing and phone sales increased.

item.title: Target warns February sales were soft, adding to concerns about consumer health
item.description: Targetâ€™s weak first-quarter guidance added to concerns about consumer health after weak January spending numbers and a slide in consumer confidence.

item.title: Saudi oil giant Aramco posts drop in full-year profit, slashes dividend
item.description: Saudi state oil producer Aramco reported a decline in net profit in 2024 and warned of a dividend cut.

item.title: WBD adds 6.4 million Max subscribers, forecasts 150 million subs by end of 2026
item.description: Warner Bros. Discovery said Thursday it added 6.4 million global streaming subscribers in the fourth quarter for a total of 116.9 million subscribers.
